SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_VIEWS, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, COALESCE(l.like_count, 0) AS like_count, COALESCE(s.scrap_count, 0) AS scrap_count FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM public.like_board GROUP BY board_no ) l ON b.board_no = l.board_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, COUNT(*) AS scrap_count FROM public.scrap_board GROUP BY board_no ) s ON b.board_no = s.board_no WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{content} ||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{content} ||'%'

AND B.BOARD_TAG LIKE '#노하우'

ORDER BY SCRAP_COUNT DESC, BOARD_NO DESC
